bibl.title: A New 2nd Century B.C. Prosangelma.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: GONIS, Nikolaos

bibl.note: Petition addressed to Apollonios, epistates of Oxyrhyncha, by an Egyptian, Petearpheneithes, who was physically assaulted and gravely wounded by another Egyptian, Kollouthos. Oxyrhyncha, around the middle of the 2nd century B.C.
GONIS Nikolaos, A New 2nd Century B.C. Prosangelma.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 231-235 et pl. 12, 1.
141.4 P. Athen. Soc. Pap. Inv. O189
